column4: Hey guys, I have a little niggling thing with the behaviour of file-roller in Ubuntu. Whenever you extract a zip, it makes a folder called *zip file name*_FILES then puts the content of the zip inside there. How can I make it NOT do that?
i highly recommend breezy.  its sooo much better than hoary (at least on my hardware)
I'm about 50/50 Hoary/Breezy here. I used shipit to get my Hoary discs. It is only 300mb or so, I should just leave it going overnight.
